title: Episode #71 - Duncan Trussell & ME
description: Comedian Duncan Trussell visits me in the Mancave & proves me right in believing he is one of the greatest dudes alive. We talk about stress, and soon I begin to spiral, so Duncan he leads me through a guided meditation, and we then blissfully enjoy a talk about life, death, growth, and all things great!
